headline: Solving Complex Problems
subheadline: I bridge the gap between engineering complexities and business goals.

bio.title: Full Stack Expertise
bio.description: I am a Full-Stack Developer with 2 years of experience building scalable, high-performance web applications using the MERN stack and modern JavaScript technologies. My focus is on creating robust architectures that stand the test of time.

cards.title: Performance First
cards.quote: "Companies struggle with building fast, user-friendly interfaces that retain users..."
cards.description: I solve this by developing highly responsive and optimized frontends using React and TypeScript, which improve load times, user engagement, and overall product experience.

cards.title: Scalable Systems
cards.quote: "Teams often face delays because backend systems are not scalable..."
cards.description: I address this by building reliable Node.js and Express services, designing efficient APIs, and improving data flow â€” leading to faster feature delivery and fewer production issues.

cards.title: Cloud Infrastructure
cards.quote: "Engineering teams lose valuable time fixing deployment issues..."
cards.description: I streamline this by using Docker, AWS, and Azure to build CI/CD pipelines that automate deployments, creating consistent environments and cost-optimized cloud usage.

dsa.title: Algorithmic Mastery
dsa.quote: "Large-scale applications often break under load when not built with clean architecture..."
dsa.description: By leveraging a strong DSA foundation (400+ problems solved) and system-design thinking, I ensure solutions remain robust and performant as the user base grows.
